viewsWelcome.contents:
Cluster is not accessible. Use install tool to start Cluster or any other cluster which is active. 
[Kind](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/tools/#kind) 

Create local cluster quikcly with kind. 
[Create KinD Cluster](command:vscode-gloo.kind.create) 
You can also check other Kubernetes local cluster tools like [Minikube](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/tools/#minikube).

Gloo Edge is not installed,check [Gloo Edge Documentation](https://docs.solo.io/gloo-edge/latest/getting_started/) to get started. 

You can also click the button below to install Gloo Edge on to your local active kubernetes cluster.  
[Install Gloo Edge](command:vscode-gloo.gloo.edge.install)

Gloo Mesh is not installed. 
[Gloo Mesh](https://docs.solo.io/gloo-mesh/latest/) to get started. You can also click the button below to install Gloo Edge on to your Kubernetes cluster.
[Install Gloo Mesh](command:vscode-gloo.gloo.mesh.install)
